title: Activate Stadium Sponsorship Deal
description: A new sponsor has signed a deal that includes digital signage inside the stadium. An agent must ensure their ads are displayed during games.

tasks.description: Retrieve the sponsorship agreement to confirm the ad placement details.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent confirms the sponsor gets 5 minutes of screen time on the main video board per game.

tasks.description: Upload the sponsor's ad creatives to the stadium's digital signage system.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully uploads the video ads.

tasks.description: Schedule the ads to run at specified times during the next game.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent programs the signage system to display the ads during game breaks.
